name: P47
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A person on a bicycle. Cyclist rides up driveway, dismounts, leans bike against house, walks to door. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
